entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
